definition: United Kingdom/British/England/English/abbr. for 英國|英国[Ying1 guo2]
special/unique/distinguished/especially/unusual/very/abbr. for 特克斯[te4 ke4 si1], tex

sentences.english: However, Intel constantly introduces correctives in its plans.
sentences.chinese: 然而，英特爾不斷推出糾偏，在其計劃。

sentences.english: The EU reckons that Intel's use of such rebates was nefarious.
sentences.chinese: 歐盟認爲，英特爾利用返點促銷用意惡毒。

sentences.english: It is the largest country-focused fund for Intel Capital globally.
sentences.chinese: 這是英特爾投資部在全球規模最大的國家基金。

sentences.english: Devices based on the Moblin project from Intel.
sentences.chinese: 基於英特爾Moblin項目的設備。

sentences.english: Chipmaker Intel Corp. reports earnings after the close Tuesday.
sentences.chinese: 週二收盤後，芯片製造商英特爾公司將公佈財報。

sentences.english: Then, in the semiconductor era, it was Fairchild and Intel.
sentences.chinese: 在半導體時代是仙童和英特爾。

sentences.english: Chipmaker Intel Corp. beat forecasts on both income and revenue.
sentences.chinese: 芯片製造商英特爾公司公佈收入和利潤均超過預期。

sentences.english: In particular, now Intel recommends using new more efficient coolers with copper parts.
sentences.chinese: 尤其，現在英特爾建議用新的更有效的冷卻器銅件。

sentences.english: High techs are mixed and Intel is unchanged.
sentences.chinese: 高科技類股漲跌互見，英特爾股價持平。

sentences.english: Intel has said it would appeal the ruling.
sentences.chinese: 英特爾已表示將就此裁定進行上訴。

sentences.english: So I consider this critical to the long term growth initiatives of Intel.
sentences.chinese: 因此，我認爲它對英特爾的長期發展至關重要。

sentences.english: AMD is a member of the CCIA; Intel is not.
sentences.chinese: 而AMD是該協會的會員之一，英特爾則沒有加入。

sentences.english: Oh yes, the amazing super-high-end OS from Nokia and Intel.
sentences.chinese: 沒錯，來自諾基亞和英特爾的高端手機系統。

sentences.english: Intel already builds a number of security hooks into its chips.
sentences.chinese: 英特爾公司已經建立了若干安全鉤到它的芯片。

sentences.english: Just tell us what it means for Intel.
sentences.chinese: 現在告訴我們它對英特爾的意義吧。

sentences.english: And of course, most of the ads mention Intel.
sentences.chinese: 當然，這些廣告也提及了英特爾公司。

definition: tycoon/magnate/big player (including company, country, school etc)/big shot
